name: Chen Wei
routine: Chen Wei sleeps around 11:30 pm and wakes up at 7:00 am to get to his engineering job.
occupation: Chen Wei is a civil engineer who works on infrastructure projects, with a steady 9-to-5 job at a construction company.
thoughts: Chen Wei spent the weekend of 2024-02-03 assisting in the planning of his sister's wedding, which, despite the stress, he enjoyed thoroughly.
lifestyle: Chen prefers a minimalistic home environment and engages in evening indoor rock climbing sessions for his health and pleasure.

name: Kazuo Tanaka
routine: Kazuo sleeps at 1 am and wakes at 8 am, usually starting his day with a traditional tea ceremony.
occupation: Kazuo Tanaka is a graphic designer working for a gaming company from 10 am to 7 pm.
thoughts: Kazuo is currently focused on a new game's release set for February 3rd, 2024.
lifestyle: He values a Zen-like environment at home to foster calmness and creativity.

name: Sophia Petrova
routine: Sophia Petrova usually sleeps around 11:30pm and wakes up at 7am to prepare breakfast for her family.
occupation: Sophia Petrova is a professional photographer. She has photoshoots scheduled at various times, including weekends.
thoughts: Sophia Petrova is currently editing photos from a wedding she shot on February 2nd and is excited about an upcoming art gallery exhibit.
lifestyle: Sophia Petrova enjoys the arts, loves attending theatre performances, and often experiments with vegan cooking recipes.
